article_title: As Trump Bashes Obamacare, Fellow Republicans Embrace Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: More Republican Governors are embracing Obamacare's Medicaid expansion while GOP presidential nominee Donald Trump bashes the law signed six years ago by President Obama
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
